events.name: Participation in Global Value Chains (GVC) for EV Li-ion batteries
events.wd_label: Participation in Global Value Chains (GVC) for EV Li-ion batteries
events.wd_description: Measures the extent of countries' involvement in the trade of intermediate goods for EV Li-ion batteries using trade data and various indices.
events.description: Measures the extent of countries' involvement in the trade of intermediate goods for EV Li-ion batteries using trade data and various indices.

events.name: Intermediate goods trade indicators
events.wd_description: Indicators reveal the prominence of a country's participation at intermediate product levels as products cross borders in the EV Li-ion battery GVC.
events.description: Indicators reveal the prominence of a country's participation at intermediate product levels as products cross borders in the EV Li-ion battery GVC.

events.name: subheadings
events.wd_description: HS-6 subheadings capture international trade for different forms of graphite used in the battery supply chain.
events.description: HS-6 subheadings capture international trade for different forms of graphite used in the battery supply chain.

events.name: Immediate material inputs
events.wd_description: Includes coal tar pitch and calcined petroleum coke (HS 2708.10, HS 2713.12) as feedstocks for producing needle coke and artificial graphite.
events.description: Includes coal tar pitch and calcined petroleum coke (HS 2708.10, HS 2713.12) as feedstocks for producing needle coke and artificial graphite.

events.name: artificial refined graphite
events.wd_description: Refined form of graphite (HS 3801.10) used in trade-based GVC measures.
events.description: Refined form of graphite (HS 3801.10) used in trade-based GVC measures.

events.name: Coverage Ratio
events.wd_description: A GVC measure used to assess the extent of a country's participation in the trade of intermediate goods.
events.description: A GVC measure used to assess the extent of a country's participation in the trade of intermediate goods.

events.name: Grubel-Lloyd Index
events.wd_description: Provides country-level information on intra-materials trade by comparing absolute net exports with total trade of the same good.
events.description: Provides country-level information on intra-materials trade by comparing absolute net exports with total trade of the same good.

events.name: natural
events.wd_description: Reflects increased imports of natural graphite and calcined petroleum coke, leading to higher GL index in 2019.
events.description: Reflects increased imports of natural graphite and calcined petroleum coke, leading to higher GL index in 2019.

events.name: Canada
events.wd_description: Higher GL index reflects greater intra-materials trade in graphite GVC.
events.description: Higher GL index reflects greater intra-materials trade in graphite GVC.

events.name: Germany
events.wd_description: Higher GL index reflects greater intra-materials trade in graphite GVC.
events.description: Higher GL index reflects greater intra-materials trade in graphite GVC.

events.name: France
events.wd_description: Higher GL index reflects greater intra-materials trade in graphite GVC.
events.description: Higher GL index reflects greater intra-materials trade in graphite GVC.

events.name: United States
events.wd_description: Major processor and trader of graphite GVC with lower GL index due to being a leading producer and exporter of calcined petroleum coke.
events.description: Major processor and trader of graphite GVC with lower GL index due to being a leading producer and exporter of calcined petroleum coke.

events.name: calcined petroleum coke
events.wd_description: Significant export product for the United States in the graphite GVC.
events.description: Significant export product for the United States in the graphite GVC.

events.name: Revealed Comparative Advantage
events.wd_description: Another GVC measure included in the assessment of intermediate goods trade for EV Li-ion batteries.
events.description: Another GVC measure included in the assessment of intermediate goods trade for EV Li-ion batteries.

events.name: Future growth in graphite consumption
events.wd_description: Anticipated growth in global graphite consumption driven by the Li-ion battery sector, with significant production capacity development by China.
events.description: Anticipated growth in global graphite consumption driven by the Li-ion battery sector, with significant production capacity development by China.

events.name: Growth in graphite consumption
events.wd_description: Global graphite consumption by Li-ion batteries is expected to grow significantly by 2030.
events.description: Global graphite consumption by Li-ion batteries is expected to grow significantly by 2030.

events.name: China's production capacity
events.wd_description: China has developed production capacity at every stage of the battery GVC, positioning itself to capture projected growth in demand.
events.description: China has developed production capacity at every stage of the battery GVC, positioning itself to capture projected growth in demand.

events.name: Non-Chinese firms' integration efforts
events.wd_description: Non-Chinese firms are attempting to become fully integrated producers to meet rising demand and allay customer concerns about supply disruptions.
events.description: Non-Chinese firms are attempting to become fully integrated producers to meet rising demand and allay customer concerns about supply disruptions.

events.name: ironmental opposition
events.wd_description: Potential environmental opposition could delay the development of new GVCs for graphite mining and processing.
events.description: Potential environmental opposition could delay the development of new GVCs for graphite mining and processing.
